choices.text: Did you see a pencil anywhere around here?
It shouldn't have been too long ago.
It's a unique, lucky pencil, so it would stand out.

dialogs.text: Uhhh, ok, I'm trying to think of anything that stood out!
Ack, it's important?! Let me think...
RevealResults02 How convenient! Although this could also mean important things are easier to keep track of, not just recall later... Hey, it worked anyways!
...................Um, I think maybe the roommate took it... Maybe.
I swear, that's all I know, I think. Oops, didn't realize I was fidgeting that much. Don't mind me.
